mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVX_URI ( K_ID, S_URI, S_METHOD, S_PARAM_TYPE, MSG_ADDRESS, S_GLOBAL_ID, S_SCRIPT, S_SENDER, S_RESPONDER, L_REQUIRED_PARAM, L_RETURN_FILTERS, L_CONTENT_MIMES, L_ACCEPT_MIMES ) VALUES ( #{uniqueId}, #{uri}, #{method, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{paramType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{address}, #{globalId}, #{script}, #{sender,typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ClassHandler}, #{responder,typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ClassHandler}, #{requiredParam, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler}, #{returnFilters, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler}, #{contentMimes, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler}, #{acceptMimes, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler} )

INSERT INTO EVX_URI ( K_ID, S_URI, S_METHOD, S_PARAM_TYPE, MSG_ADDRESS, S_GLOBAL_ID, S_SCRIPT, S_SENDER, S_RESPONDER, L_REQUIRED_PARAM, L_RETURN_FILTERS, L_CONTENT_MIMES, L_ACCEPT_MIMES ) VALUES
( #{item.uniqueId}, #{item.uri}, #{item.method, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{item.paramType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{item.address}, #{item.globalId}, #{item.script}, #{item.sender,typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ClassHandler}, #{item.responder,typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ClassHandler}, #{item.requiredParam, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler}, #{item.returnFilters, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler}, #{item.contentMimes, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler}, #{item.acceptMimes, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler} )
mapper.update: UPDATE EVX_URI SET S_URI=#{uri}, S_METHOD=#{method,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, S_PARAM_TYPE=#{paramType,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, MSG_ADDRESS=#{address}, S_GLOBAL_ID=#{globalId}, S_SCRIPT=#{script}, S_SENDER=#{sender,typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ClassHandler}, S_RESPONDER=#{responder,typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ClassHandler}, L_REQUIRED_PARAM=#{requiredParam, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler}, L_RETURN_FILTERS=#{returnFilters, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler}, L_CONTENT_MIMES=#{contentMimes, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler}, L_ACCEPT_MIMES=#{acceptMimes, typeHandler=com.prayer.plugin.db.handler.ArrayHandler} WHERE K_ID=#{uniqueId}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM EVX_URI WHERE K_ID IN
#{item}

select.if: SELECT * FROM EVX_URI ORDER BY ${orderBy} LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{start}
